title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part promulgates the regulations governing
construction, maintenance and use of fallout shelters applicable to family
fallout shelters and the regulations governing construction, maintenance and
use of fallout shelters applicable to group fallout shelters (Appendix
L-1). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
502.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
